In an attempt to stop gays from having any sort of legal protection, including health benefits, it appears they have stopped even straight couples from having the type of relationships they want. These ammendments, most of which will be struck down in the courts, hurt straight families just as much as gay families. It also appears the country's healthcare problems are about to get worse as thousands will soon loose their access to health insurance and start looking fro free healthcare from the states.
